result.name: tourism-business-monitor
result.notes:
5 times yearly survey of accommodation and attractions businesses providing indication of business performance, sentiment and attitudes to "hot topic" areas. Publication schedule for  results is at http://www.visitengland.org/Images/Continuous%20surveys_2013_v7_tcm30-32182.pdf

All current survey deliverables are online at http://www.visitengland.org/insight-statistics/major-tourism-surveys/accommodations/Accommodation_Business_Confidence_Monitor/
result.title: Tourism Business Monitor

extras.value:
Results are currently provided in the format of powerpoint reports, which are published in pdf format, though in future we will publish the original powerpoint alongside this.

VE does not currently receive a database of results alongside the report, so there would be cost and resource implications for this, which would need to be reviewed. As data refers to the performance of individual businesses, there are commercial sensitivities, and we would need to verify whether this can be truly anonymised before considering publication
